movie1.title: Deadpool
movie1.actors: Ryan Reynolds, Karan Soni, Ed Skrein, Michael Benyaer
movie1.plot: A wisecracking mercenary gets experimented on and becomes immortal but ugly, and sets out to track down the man who ruined his looks.
movie1.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 27 wins 73 nominations.

movie2.actors: John Cusack, Amanda Peet, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Thandie Newton
movie2.plot: A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.
movie2.language: English, French, Tibetan, Mandarin, Russian, Hindi, Portuguese, Latin, Italian, Spanish

movie3.title: The Green Mile
movie3.actors: Tom Hanks, David Morse, Bonnie Hunt, Michael Clarke Duncan
movie3.plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
movie3.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 15 wins 32 nominations.

movie4.title: James Bond
movie4.actors: Allari Naresh, Sakshi Chaudhary, Raghu Babu, Banerjee
movie4.plot: Nani (Allari Naresh) is a trepid and fearful guy who works as a software engineer. Bullet (Sakshi Chaudhary) is a mafia don in Dubai. Her mother doesn't know about Bullet's profession. ...

movie5.title: Lethal Weapon
movie5.actors: Mel Gibson, Danny Glover, Gary Busey, Mitchell Ryan
movie5.plot: Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.
movie5.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins 1 nomination.

movie6.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
movie6.writer: Gary Scott Thompson (characters), Michael Brandt (story), Derek Haas (story), Gary Scott Thompson (story), Michael Brandt (screenplay), Derek Haas (screenplay)
movie6.actors: Paul Walker, Tyrese Gibson, Eva Mendes, Cole Hauser
movie6.plot: Former cop Brian O'Conner is called upon to bust a dangerous criminal and he recruits the help of a former childhood friend and street racer who has a chance to redeem himself.

movie7.title: Vabank
movie7.actors: Jan Machulski, Leonard Pietraszak, Witold Pyrkosz, Ewa Szykulska
movie7.plot: Set in Warsaw in 1930's. After six years in jail, framed for bank robbery by an accomplice, the legendary Kwinto has only revenge on his mind. He is a safecracker in the old style, a thief ...

movie8.title: Batman
movie8.writer: Bob Kane (Batman characters), Sam Hamm (story), Sam Hamm (screenplay), Warren Skaaren (screenplay)
movie8.actors: Michael Keaton, Jack Nicholson, Kim Basinger, Robert Wuhl
movie8.plot: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.

movie9.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
movie9.actors: Ralph Fiennes, Michael Gambon, Alan Rickman, Daniel Radcliffe
movie9.plot: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.
movie9.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 45 wins 91 nominations.

movie10.title: John Wick
movie10.actors: Keanu Reeves, Michael Nyqvist, Alfie Allen, Willem Dafoe
movie10.plot: An ex-hit-man comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog and took everything from him.

movie11.title: Hitman
movie11.actors: Timothy Olyphant, Dougray Scott, Olga Kurylenko, Robert Knepper
movie11.plot: A gun-for-hire known only as Agent 47 hired by a group known only as 'The Organization' is ensnared in a political conspiracy, which finds him pursued by both Interpol and the Russian military as he treks across Russia and Eastern Europe.

movie12.title: The Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift
movie12.actors: Lucas Black, Damien Marzette, Trula M. Marcus, Zachery Ty Bryan
movie12.plot: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

movie13.title: The Fast and the Furious
movie13.writer: Ken Li (magazine article "Racer X"), Gary Scott Thompson (screen story), Gary Scott Thompson (screenplay), Erik Bergquist (screenplay), David Ayer (screenplay)
movie13.actors: Paul Walker, Vin Diesel, Michelle Rodriguez, Jordana Brewster
movie13.plot: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

movie14.title: Fast and Furious
movie14.actors: Franchot Tone, Ann Sothern, Ruth Hussey, Lee Bowman
movie14.plot: Rare book dealers Joel and Garda take a summertime jaunt to the seashore where he becomes involved in a beauty pageant as investor and judge much to her chagrin.
